answers.answer: Try to calm down, you're stressing yourself over something that can be easily reversed as long as you take the appropriate actions today. If you are borderline diabetic, "identified mild elevation in blood sugar... ", you have a good chance of reversing this by not eating bad [simple] carbohydrates - foods made with white flour - reduce eating starchy foods such as potatoes and pasta, and exercise daily. If overweight, lose the weight. Do yourself a favor use Google search and get educated on diabetes. Good luck.

question: Friends, pls help me on this... i am 31 years old...actually i was free from diabetes before 5 months... but last three months i am on extreme stress with fear regarding my health... today by medical check up they identified mild elevation in blood sugar...pls suggest me it will be temporary raise   or i need to go for treatment.... i am very affraid of it.... now my stress level is extreme.but my family background is normal in blood sugarpls waiting for replyh
title: pls suggest me diabetes
